description: The focus at this restaurant is on a variety of local ingredients and specialities that even a novice food-lover would recognise as typical of this region. The owner-chef at this intimate and elegant gem of a restaurant is Ruggiero Doronzo, whose mantra is “simplicity and seasonality”.
